short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reads job descriptions on LinkedIn and, using AI, finds the information that interests you

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reading through many job descriptions on LinkedIn can be quite challenging. It's difficult to find something that suits you perfectly. You can delegate this task to AI Job Analyzer. Ask your questions of interest, and AI will analyse the job descriptions and answer those questions while you browse through the listings. For example, you might be interested in whether the company offers a relocation package or requires knowledge of React.
